name: Bent over table + Creampie LoRA
description:
A LoRA for creating images of women getting fucked from behind while bending over a table (or anything else).

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

Be warned this one is a bit tricky to get good results from.

First of all, it helps a lot if your prompt goes along with what you want from the model, so include things like 'bending over table' or 'getting fucked by man from behind'.

Also I recommend a minimum resolution of 640x640, any lower and you will get bad faces.

Then, there are four important trigger words you should always use, and for better results put their respective opposites in the negative prompt if applicable.

  • General trigger: 'bntovr'

  • 'Vaginal' or 'anal'

  • 'leg up' or 'leg down'

  • 'From side' or 'from behind'

As always, it also does creampies if you use 'creampie' or 'cum'.

Using 'flat' makes her lay down flat on the table (most of the time).

Adding 'close up' to your prompt generally gives better results.

Putting anime in the negative prompt helps getting better faces if you're using it for photo-realistic images.

Hope this proves useful to you. Would love to see some of your results!

Recommended LoRA strength 0.7-0.8.

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
